## eachLimit() function

Sames as [each()](./promizr.each.md) but limit the number of concurrent iterator.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export default function eachLimit<T>(array: T[], limit: number, iterator: AsyncListIterator<T, unknown>, options?: QueueOptions): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  array | T\[\] | The array to iterate on |
|  limit | number | The maximum number of iterator to run concurrently |
|  iterator | [AsyncListIterator](./promizr.asynclistiterator.md)<!-- -->&lt;T, unknown&gt; | The iterator to apply on each item |
|  options | [QueueOptions](./promizr.queueoptions.md) | The options for the inner TaskQueue |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;
